person.persName: Flerving P. Robertson (Fleming County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Robertson. Father of Henry F. Robertson and Charles W. Robertson. Merchant in Fleming County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 73. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Tilton, p. 3.
